Title: Limits the number of cases a foster care worker may have under his or her supervision at any one time to 16 cases
Summary: Limits the number of cases a foster care worker may have under his or her supervision at any one time to 16 cases.
LawCode: Amd ยง409-g, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to limitations on the number of cases handled by child welfare personnel
